name: duet-backend
description: Backend server for Duet e-commerce system

scripts.dev:env: set NODE_ENV=development&& set DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.development&&  nodemon -r dotenv/config server.js
scripts.prod:env: set NODE_ENV=production&& set DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.production&& node -r dotenv/config server.js

author: Duet Team
